channel.title: Gingko on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Gingko on My New Hugo Site

item.title: A Love Letter to Gingko
item.description: [big]When it comes to writing, I think that the biggest problem for a lot of people is properly organizing their ideas. There’s just so much to put into a document, and without well-considered organization, it can get a little long, jumbled, and overly ranty. (Overly ranty is bad.)[/big] But that doesn’t necessarily mean that there isn’t room to rethink the approach. Perhaps you shouldn’t be writing in a totally linear formatâ€”perhaps you need to think in terms of a flow chart, one that is flexible to the whims of your prose.
